column4: Shorthand version of my question above...  How can I restore the boot signature of a drive, now that I've booted into Linux using the LiveCD?

hi! im on the livecd right now trying to install kubuntu... But the picture keeps getting over to my tv out. Is there any software I can use to make it go to my original screen or at least get it to dual view_

hi! im on the livecd right now trying to install kubuntu... But the picture keeps getting over to my tv out. Is there any software I can use to make it go to my original screen or at least get it to dual view_
if you run an nvidia card and install the restricted drivers you can select dual view options etc with nvidia-settings
